name: Poradnik Uśmiechu: Interaktywny! (Smile Guide: Interactive!)
description:
Smile Guide: Interactive! is a point-and-click game based on a series of Polish youtube videos created by KrainaGrzybowTV (link below). The goal is to solve puzzles by examining and interacting with the environment.

www.youtube.com/user/krainagrzybowtv

This game is available in both English and Polish. The Polish language translation was done by David Borrowed.

This game was first shared in December 2014.
